thread.title: The Nunes Memo on FISA, Annotated

author: WSJ Staff
title: The Nunes Memo on FISA, Annotated
text:
House Republicans on Friday released a memo that alleges abuses in the surveillance of a onetime adviser to Donald Trump. The memo, prepared under House Intelligence Committee Chairman Devin Nunes, contends that authorization under the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act, or FISA, for the surveillance of Carter Page was based largely on a dossier by Christopher Steele, a former British spy, without disclosing that he had been paid through intermediaries by the Democratic Party.
The Federal Bureau of Investigation and Democrats...
